_header: Hail be Thou Mary most of honour
Subjects: carols, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, hymns to
_description: To the Virgin — four quatrains (aabb) with ‘Aue plena gracia’ refrain and burden: ‘Ave, plena gracia / Dei mater Maria’

BLEge3307.First Lines:
Hayle be þu mary most of honowrþu bar ihesu our
                    sauiour…
BLEge3307.Last Lines:
…þow pray for vs vnto thy sonIn heuen blyss þat we
                    may wonmariaAue p[lena] g[racia]
